name: bj-ndxarg

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1), wcel(cn, universe), wcel(c1, cn))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0 ` ndx)= c1, ℕ ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ ℕ)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1)
-| wcel(cn, universe)
-| wcel(c1, cn)
-| wi(wa(wcel(cn, universe), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1)

stmt.origin: syl5eq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1, cfv(cslot(c1), cres(cid, cn)), wa(wcel(cn, universe), wcel(c1, cn)))
stmt.pretty: syl5eq((c0 ` ndx), c1, (Slot(c1)`(= |` ℕ)), (ℕ ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(cn, universe), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1))
-| wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cslot(c1), cres(cid, cn)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cn, universe), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(cslot(c1), cres(cid, cn)), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1)
-| wcel(c1, cn)
-| wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cslot(c1), cres(cid, cn)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(cn, universe), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(cslot(c1), cres(cid, cn)), c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), cfv(cslot(c1), cres(cid, cn)))
-| wceq(c0, cslot(c1))
-| wceq(cnx, cres(cid, cn))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ` ndx)=(Slot(c1)`(= |` ℕ))
⊣ c0 = Slot(c1)
⊣ ndx =(= |` ℕ)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1)

-| wceq(c0, cslot(c1))
-| wceq(cnx, cres(cid, cn))

|- wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1)
-| wcel(c1, cn)
-| wi(wa(wcel(cn, universe), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(cslot(c1), cres(cid, cn)), c1))
-| wceq(c0, cslot(c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(cn, universe), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(cfv(cslot(c1), cres(cid, cn)), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(c0, cnx), c1)
-| wcel(c1, cn)
-| wceq(c0, cslot(c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ` ndx)= c1
⊣ c1 ∈ ℕ
